title: [CLIENT] MASTER YI CHROMA'S NOT WORKING

replies.body:
Morning Crys3s! 

I just set up a Team Builder and selected the Headhunter Yi chromas without any issues. (Screenshot attached). Are you only having this issue in Team Builder, or in any queue you attempt to use this chroma pack in?

When selected the chroma pack, are you selecting Master Yi -> Headhunter Yi -> Selecting the color you'd like to use? 

If you're still having issues, please submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can take a look at your account to make sure the content is unlocked properly.

Thank you for the reply Katey! I am able to select it, the issue is when I get to the loadscreen and then in game the skin is not showing up. I have not tried selecting it in other game modes yet - only team builder.  I received 3 error messages upon purchase and am not sure if  it is a result of that. I will submit a ticket as you requested. 

Thank you!

As for the load screen, you should see base HeadHunter Yi's splash, as chroma packs won't have unique splash art - they use the parent skin's splash. 

As seen in the earlier attached screenshot, are you selecting one of the squares of color to select which HH Yi chroma you're looking to use? 

If none of that works, Support will be able to help you out a bit further. :]
Yup, selecting it. No results =(. Thank you for the help anyways!
can you look at my post, my issue still hasn't been tended to, i know ya'll cant tend to everyone but i can't play because idk who is calling what lanes.
